name: Emoticon 3D Coloring book – color emojis
description:
The best coloring book app with a big selection of emoticons. Color and have fun. The user-friendly design is perfect for tablet as well. Learn and have fun!
• Select the emoji you want to color
• Use the color palette
• Press the button and transform the character or face with 3D effect
Features:
• They can color emoticons with pencils of their choice.
• They can learn how to mix colors and boost their creativity.
• Educational game with endless possibilities.
• Use your fingers as crayons to paint emoticons drawings.
